attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To make illegal the manufacture, sale, importation and use of electric shock collar devices on dogs for any purpose.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban Electric Shock Collars."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12967.asp

Prime Minister's Office
